mapper.select: select * from nursing_level where status = 1 order by create_time desc

select l.*, su.real_name as creator, p.plan_name as plan_name, p.id as plan_id from nursing_level l left join sys_user su on l.create_by = su.id left join nursing_plan p on p.id = l.lplan_id
and l.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and l.status = #{status}
order by l.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into nursing_level (name, description, fee, status, sortNo, create_by, update_by, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{fee}, #{status}, #{sortNo}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select l.*, p.plan_name as plan_name, p.id as plan_id from nursing_level l left join nursing_plan p on p.id = l.lplan_id where l.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update nursing_level set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, fee = #{fee}, status = #{status}, sortNo = #{sortNo}, update_by = #{updateBy}, remark = #{remark}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
